ygData.subject: Re: Bayle List
ygData.msgSnippet: A friend and i finished this quest a while ago. And the result we got was Peitro telling us to get lost. Now as far we know we did everything. Got all 3
ygData.messageBody:
A friend and i "finished" this quest a while ago. And
the result we got was Peitro telling us to get lost.
Now as far we know we did everything.
Got all 3 parts, decoded them, gave to Peitro.

But this was a while ago before all the patches that
"enhanced" quests.

Before i waste my time camping Dyllin again (i already
have the other 2 parts...again..for the 3rd time)
What was your result.
And how did you get the list from Dyllin? He wouldnt
talk to us so we had to kill him despite the negative
faction we got with Kane and CorruptGuards. I am
convinced that there is a way to get it from him
without killing him, but i think its linked with the
"Opal" in Freeport we need to contact. And i cant get
her to talk either.
NOTE: i dont believe its the Opal in the Necro guild.
Im pretty sure its the Opal in the Arcane building.

BTW.. i also did the Bayle List quest for Commander
Kane in Qeynos. He does not require it to be decoded.
I gave him all 3 parts, got congratulated, now he can
kill these folks and may Disease run thru my veins or
something. He gave me 20Sp and sent me on my way.

Has anyone tried this recently to see if the end
results have been "enhanced"?

Bathory D'Allatu

--- Jeremy Pollack <jpollack@...> wrote:
> Thought I'd share that I *finally* finished the
> Bayle List quest tonight.
> Well ... I don't think finished. I'm sure there is
> more to it, but I
> retrieve it, decoded it, and returned it to Pietro.
> Wondering how others
> were doing with this as this list has been quiet.
> I'm so happy to have
> finally finished this part of it ... my notes are
> scribbled all over the
> place on stuff and what people said and all that
> rigamaroll.
>
> So ... has anyone else been working on it? Made any
> other headway? etc.
>
> later,
> jer
>
> aka
>
> Virten, Knight of Innoruuk
